title: Hello World
description: This is our first blog post. Really cool
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:o,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const t={a:"a",code:"code",h1:"h1",h3:"h3",p:"p",...r.components},{Callout:a}=t;return a||function(e,o){throw new Error("Expected "+(o?"component":"object")+" `"+e+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it.")}("Callout",!0),n(e,{children:[o(a,{type:"warning",children:"Hello I am a callout"}),"
",n("figure",{children:[o("img",{src:"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556740758-90de374c12ad?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80",alt:""}),o("figcaption",{children:o(t.p,{children:"Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has
roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over
